ygData.subject: Re: Heard about a quest...
ygData.msgSnippet: From what I gather one of the NPC s in Rivervale gives some kind of good reward to the Druid who returns certain items back to him and the dagger of the great
ygData.messageBody:
From what I gather one of the NPC's in Rivervale gives some kind of good
reward to the Druid who returns certain items back to him and the dagger of
the great Dvinn is one of those items.
-----Original Message-----
From: Mifsud, Michael <Michael.Mifsud@...>
To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com' <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, May 31, 1999 10:42 PM
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Heard about a quest...


>From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
>You killed my brother!
>
>ANYWAY....
>
>The weapon in itself is pretty bad, has a low ratio. The only class I
think
>who would find it useful are the quest people your refer to (no idea which
>quest btw) or mages, maybe. Druids, why?
>
>Id like to get my hands on one to add to my collection.
>
>Jaade D'Vinn
>Indigo Sista Soldier
>
>
>
>> ----------
>> From: Brandon R. Veatch[SMTP:lrddragn@...]

>> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com

>>
>> I'm not completely sure but I think that you can get a pretty good price
>> from a druid for that dagger. Seems every druid I run across is after
it.
>> Anyway, good luck finding out what you need.
>>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Carole Roth <galaxy4@...>
>> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>

>> Subject: [warriors_eq] Heard about a quest...

>> >From: Carole Roth <galaxy4@...>

>> >death incarnate (Dvinn) at some point. I have obtained his weapon-an
>> >ornate dagger dmg 3 delay 20-and i heard that it is part of a quest,
>> >maybe in Rivervale???, in which you get a hat that gives you charisma
>> >+10 when you are wearing it. Anyone have any info on this quest? Any
>> >help would be most appreciated. Thanks in advance.
>> > -Sabretooth, Warrior of the Wolves
